author: pburba
msg: Fix path concatenation bug in mod_dav_svn when using JavaSVN.
JavaSVN sends absolute paths in the REPORT body rather than paths relative to
the request uri.  This turned up a simple bug that until now had escaped
noticed in the ebcdic port.  Thanks to Alexander Kitaev for getting us pointed
in the right direction on this.

author: cmpilato
msg: Remove interfaces orphaned by the changes in r15569.
Little Miss Muffer, sat in her buffer,
Staring at code that was stale.
Along came Pilato, who did what he ought to,
And sent that old cruft back to Hell.

author: cmpilato
msg: Port the libsvn_fs_fs merge() algorithm changes (made circa r13222) to
(merge): Rewrite to match the new algorithm used by libsvn_fs_fs as
(test_funcs): Mark merging_commit() as XFAIL, with a comment

author: cmpilato
msg: Make the repos-test authz tests cleanup after themselves.
(authz_get_handle): Always try to close and remove the authz_test_*

author: cmpilato
msg: Consistently use svn_pool_destroy() instead of apr_pool_destroy().
